title: Warehouse Inventory Health Schema
description: Schema for validating bin consolidation and cycle counting data.

Bin_ID.description: Unique identifier for the storage location or bin (/SCWM/HUHDR).

Last_Touched_Timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last time this bin was counting or interacted with.

Cycle_Count_Variance.description: The difference between expected and actual quantity during a cycle count.
